languages.text: "Ответ отрицательный. Я не контактировал с архимагосом Амарнатом и не принадлежал к его //пастве//ученикам//свите//. Однако анализ излагаемой им доктрины вызывал у меня большое //уважение//доверие//".

"Negative. I had no contact with Archmagos Amarnat and was never a member of his //flock//disciples//retinue//. However, my analysis of the doctrine he outlined inspired in me deep //respect for//trust in// him."
languages.original_text: "Ответ отрицательный. Я не контактировал с архимагосом Амарнатом и не принадлежал к его //пастве//ученикам//свите//. Однако анализ излагаемой им доктрины вызывал у меня большое //уважение//доверие//".

traits.locale_text: "Negative. I had no contact with Archmagos Amarnat and was never a member of his //flock//following//retinue//. However, my analysis of the doctrine he outlined inspired a deep //respect for//trust in// him in me."
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: 「いいえ。私は大賢人アマルナトと接触したことはないし、彼の//群れ//弟子//従者//であったこともない。しかし、彼の要約したドクトリンの解析は、私の中に彼に対する深い//敬意//信頼//を吹き込んだ」
languages.original_text: "Negative. I had no contact with Archmagos Amarnat and was never a member of his //flock//disciples//retinue//. However, my analysis of the doctrine he outlined inspired in me deep //respect for//trust in// him."

traits.locale_text: 「いいえ。私は大賢人アマルナトと接触したことはないし、彼の//群れ//弟子//従者//であったこともない。しかし、彼の要約したドクトリンの解析は、私の中に彼に対する深い//敬意//信頼//を吹き込んだ」
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: “并非如此。我与阿玛纳特大贤者没有任何联系，也从来都不是他的追随者。不过，当我分析他的教义概述时，他的阐述激发了我发自内心的尊重与信任。”
languages.original_text: "Negative. I had no contact with Archmagos Amarnat and was never a member of his //flock//disciples//retinue//. However, my analysis of the doctrine he outlined inspired in me deep //respect for//trust in// him."

traits.locale_text: “并非如此。我与阿玛纳特大贤者没有任何联系，也从来都不是他的追随者。不过，当我分析他的教义概述时，他的阐述激发了我发自内心的尊重与信任。”
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: "Negativ. Ich hatte keinen Kontakt zu Erzmagos Amarnat und war nie ein Mitglied //seiner Herde//seiner Schüler//seines Gefolges//. Doch meine Analyse seiner Doktrin führte bei mir zu einem tiefen //Respekt für//Vertrauen in// ihn."
languages.original_text: "Negative. I had no contact with Archmagos Amarnat and was never a member of his //flock//disciples//retinue//. However, my analysis of the doctrine he outlined inspired in me deep //respect for//trust in// him."

traits.locale_text: "Negativ. Ich hatte keinen Kontakt zu Erzmagos Amarnat und war nie ein Mitglied //seiner Herde//seiner Schüler//seines Gefolges//. Doch meine Analyse seiner Doktrin führte bei mir zu einem tiefen //Respekt für//Vertrauen in// ihn."
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: « Négatif. Je n'ai eu aucun contact avec l'archimagos Amarnat et je n'ai jamais fait partie de //ses ouailles//ses disciples//son entourage//. Pour autant, mon analyse de la doctrine qu'il défendait m'a inspiré //un profond respect//une grande confiance// envers lui. »
languages.original_text: "Negative. I had no contact with Archmagos Amarnat and was never a member of his //flock//disciples//retinue//. However, my analysis of the doctrine he outlined inspired in me deep //respect for//trust in// him."

traits.locale_text: « Négatif. Je n'ai eu aucun contact avec l'archimagos Amarnat et je n'ai jamais fait partie de //ses ouailles//ses disciples//son entourage//. Pour autant, mon analyse de la doctrine qu'il défendait m'a inspiré //un profond respect//une grande confiance// envers lui. »
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: «Negativo. No he tenido ningún contacto con el archimagos Amarnat ni he sido nunca un miembro de su //rebaño//apostolado//séquito//. Sin embargo, mi análisis de la doctrina que bosquejó me ha inspirado //un gran respeto por//confianza en// él».
languages.original_text: "Negative. I had no contact with Archmagos Amarnat and was never a member of his //flock//disciples//retinue//. However, my analysis of the doctrine he outlined inspired in me deep //respect for//trust in// him."

traits.locale_text: «Negativo. No he tenido ningún contacto con el archimagos Amarnat ni he sido nunca un miembro de su //rebaño//apostolado//séquito//. Sin embargo, mi análisis de la doctrina que bosquejó me ha inspirado //un gran respeto por//confianza en// él».
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: "Olumsuz. Başmagos Amarnat ile herhangi bir temasım olmadı, hiçbir zaman onun //cemaatinden//müritlerinden//maiyetinden// olmadım ancak çerçevesini çizdiği öğretilere dair analizlerim, bende ona derin bir //saygı//güven// zuhur ettirdi."
languages.original_text: "Negative. I had no contact with Archmagos Amarnat and was never a member of his //flock//disciples//retinue//. However, my analysis of the doctrine he outlined inspired in me deep //respect for//trust in// him."

traits.locale_text: "Olumsuz. Başmagos Amarnat ile herhangi bir temasım olmadı ve hiçbir zaman onun //cemaatinden//müritlerinden//maiyetinden// olmadım ancak çerçevesini çizdiği öğretilere dair analizlerim, ona derin bir //saygı//güven// duymamı sağladı."
traits.speaker: Opticon22
